documents.document: Nice hotel, quiet location Stayed here for 3 nights in OCtober, hotel was modern and clean.Room was a good size with all amenities although the safe did not work, however was able to keep documents in reception safeBreakfast OK but nothing special, staff helpful, small pool but not busy at this time of the year.Quiet location but near to beach and Port Olympic where there are a good range of restaurants.If you buy a tourist bus ticket itis worth knowing that there is a bus stop on the blue route only 200 m away from the hotel, so transport into and from the centre is easy and cheap
